desc: E & Co. Boutique is a small family business which is operated in Sioux City, Iowa. Our owners entered the retail world 45+ years ago when they opened a hardware store. They have since expanded by opening 6 other small businesses in Iowa. All of our products are handpicked by a small team of buyers who are ages 25 to 7
